text: khaum ke log kehne lage ke hum to hamesha musibath hee mein rahe, aap ki tashreef aawari se qabl bhi aur aap ki tashreef aawari ke baadh bhi, Mosa ne farmaaya bahuth jald Allah tumhaare dushman ko halaak kar dega aur ba-jaaye un ke tum ko is sar-zameen ka qalifa bana dega, phir tumhaara tarz amal dekhega
